required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Observation of the Transscleral Suture Fixation of Posterior Chamber Intraocular Lens in Eyes With Inadequate Capsule Support
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Observation of Transscleral Suture Fixation of Posterior Chamber Intraocular Lens in Eyes With Inadequate Capsule Support

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: To present the follow-up outcomes of transscleral suture fixation of posterior chamber intraocular lens (PCIOL) in eyes with inadequate capsule support.

primary_outcome.description: Best corrected visual acuity (BCVA) measured using a decimal chart
Best corrected visual acuity (BCVA) measured using a decimal chart
Best corrected visual acuity (BCVA) measured using a decimal chart
Best corrected visual acuity (BCVA) measured using a decimal chart
uncorrected distance visual acuity (UDVA) measured using a decimal chart
uncorrected distance visual acuity (UDVA) measured using a decimal chart
uncorrected distance visual acuity (UDVA) measured using a decimal chart
uncorrected distance visual acuity (UDVA) measured using a decimal chart

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 day, 1 week, 1 month, and 3 month postoperation

secondary_outcome.description: PCIOL tilt degree measured using Ultrasound biomicroscope
PCIOL tilt degree measured using Ultrasound biomicroscope
anterior chamber depth measured using Ultrasound biomicroscope

intervention.description: patients who underwent transscleral sutured posterior chamber intraocular lens implantation

study_pop.textblock: Patients who underwent transscleral sutured PCIOL implantation between January 2017 and August 2018, in Eye Center of the Second Affiliated Hospital, Zhejiang University School of Medicine, Hangzhou, China.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients who underwent transscleral suture fixation of PCIOL
2. Time between the primary surgeries was at least 3 months
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Active intraocular inflammation
2. The intraocular pressure (IOP) was higher than 25 mmHg
3. The endothelial cell count (ECC) was more than 1,200 cells/mm2

facility.name: Second Affiliated Hospital, Zhejiang University School of Medicine
